title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Labor force in millions, with a total of 11 data points.
Overall Labor force in millions has increased over the Year
Labor force in millions is roughly constant from 2010 to 2020.
The steepest stays the same occurs in between the Year 2017 and 2018.
Max Labor force in millions about 8.94 was recorded at Year 2020
Min Labor force in millions about 8.21 was recorded at Year 2014
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Labor force in millions, with a total of 11 data points. The chart has 3 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2014 to 2020.
Additionally, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2012 to 2014.
Differently, the next significant trend is moderately increasing which exists from 2010 to 2012.
